car.description: Model Name: Ford EcoSport Vehicle Type: SUV Brand: Ford Color: Moondust Silver Mileage:21.7 Fuel Type:Diesel Fuel Capacity:52 CC:1498 Horsepower:116 Transmission:Manual Seat: 5 Wheeldrive: 4 Wheeldrive Distance Covered: 10000 Quantity: 2 Price: 3500000 Dimension: 157.4 inches (L) 69.49 inches(W) 64.84 inches(H)
car.summary: The 2020 EcoSport is designed to help you move freely. Its compact size and available Intelligent 4WD are perfect for maneuvering new terrains. No matter where you go, EcoSport comes prepared and in style with a comfortable interior and intelligent technology to help you take on the world.

car.description: Model Name: Ford EcoSport Vehcile Type: SUV Brand: Ford Color: Lightning Blue Mileage: 500 Fuel Type: Petrol Fuel Capacity: 52 CC: 1498 Horsepower: 116 Transmission: Manual Seat: 5 Wheeldrive: 4 Wheeldrive Distance Covered: 15000 Quantity: 1 Price: 3400000 Dimension: 157.4 inches (L) 69.49 inches (W) 64.84 inches (H)
car.summary: The 2020 EcoSport is designed to help you move freely. Its compact size and available Intelligent 4WD are perfect for maneuvering new terrains. No matter where you go, EcoSport comes prepared and in style with a comfortable interior and intelligent technology to help you take on the world.

car.description: Model Name: Toyota Hiace Vehicle Type: Van Brand: Toyota Color: White Pearl Crystal Shine -CH Mileage: 12 Fuel Type: Diesel Fuel Capacity: 65 CC: 2982 Horsepower: 503 Transmission: Manual Seat: 5 Wheeldrive: Rear Wheeldrive Distance Covered:20000 Quantity: 2 Price: 10800000 Dimension: 208.6 inches (L) 74.01 inches (W) 89.9 inches (H)
car.summary: Toyota Hiace Commuter Bus is virtually a luxury coach! With individual bucket seats and two seater bench seats throughout. When you drive for a living, there's no room in the operating budget for a vehicle that's expensive to run. That's why the Hiace boasts low running costs.

car.description: Model Name: Tesla Model S Vehicle Type: Luxury Brand: Tesla Color: Red Mileage: 400 Fuel Type: Electric Fuel Capacity: 75 Power Output: 825 Horsepower: 259 Transmission: Automatic Seat: 5 Wheeldrive: Full Wheeldrive Distance Covered: 20000 Quantity: 2 Price: 10800000 Dimension: 208.6 inches (L) 74.01 inches (W) 89.9 inches (H)
car.summary: Model S sets an industry standard for performance and safety. Tesla’s all-electric powertrain delivers unparalleled performance in all weather conditions.Model S can get you anywhere you want to go—with industry-leading range and convenient charging options, all over the world.

car.description: Model Name: Baleno Vehicle Type: Hatchback Brand: Maruti Color: Nexa Blue Mileage: 27.4 Fuel Type: Diesel Fuel Capacity: 37 CC: 1248 Horsepower: 109 Transmission: Manual Seat: 5 Wheeldrive: Front Wheeldrive Distance Covered: 20000 Quantity: 2 Price: 3200000 Dimension: 157 inches (L) 69 inches (W) 60 inches (H)
car.summary: Some notable features on offer are a 7.0-inch touchscreen infotainment system, Smartplay Studio App with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto, automatic climate control, steering-mounted audio controls, LED projector headlamps, 16-inch alloy wheels, dual airbags, ABS+EBD, seatbelts with pretensioner and force limiters, and ISOFIX mounts. In terms of features, Maruti Suzuki has changed the touchscreen on the top-spec Alpha variant.

car.description: Model Name: Datson Go Vehicle Type: Hatchback Brand: Datsun Color: Amber Orange Mileage: 20.1 Fuel Type: Petrol Fuel Capacity: 37 CC: 1198 Horsepower: 68 Transmission: Manual Seat: 5 Wheeldrive: Front Wheeldrive Distance Covered: 30000 Quantity: 3 Price: 1900000 Dimension: 150 inches (L) 64.3 inches (W) 58.4 inches (H)
car.summary: Some notable features on offer are a 7.0-inch touchscreen infotainment system, Smartplay Studio App with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto, automatic climate control, steering-mounted audio controls, LED projector headlamps, 16-inch alloy wheels, dual airbags, ABS+EBD, seatbelts with pretensioner and force limiters, and ISOFIX mounts. In terms of features, Maruti Suzuki has changed the touchscreen on the top-spec Alpha variant.

car.description: Model Name: Volkswagen Polo Vehicle Type: Hatchback Brand: Volkswagen Color: Carbon Steel Mileage: 21.4 Fuel Type: Diesel Fuel Capacity: 45 CC: 1498 Horsepower: 68 Transmission: Manual Seat: 5 Wheeldrive: Front Wheeldrive Distance Covered: 25000 Quantity: 5 Price: 2400000 Dimension: 150 inches (L) 64.3 inches (W) 58.4 inches (H)
car.summary: The Polo Treandline has been designed to give you the essentioals of what makes a Volkswagen. Made using the best of German engeneering, the Polo Trendline variant features many sagety and technology featiures like dual front airbags, ABS, front disc brakes and much more.

car.description: Model Name: Volkswagen Tiguan Vehicle Type: SUV Brand: Volkswagen Color: Ruby Red Mettalic Mileage: 16.6 Fuel Type: Diesel Fuel Capacity: 71 CC: 1968 Horsepower: 184 Transmission: Manual Seat: 5 Wheeldrive: Full Wheeldrive Distance Covered: 20000 Quantity: 5 Price: 12500000 Dimension: 150 inches (L) 64.3 inches (W) 58.4 inches (H)
car.summary: Tiguan offers you the comfort and convenience accustomed in Volkswagen brand of world class vehicles. The ergonomics interior with tangibly high quality that you feel at ease and have everything at your fingertips from the very first moment. The Power seat adjustment with memory feature seating system makes the Tiguan the perfect Vehicle for all kinds of luxury.

car.description: Model Name: Swift Vehicle Type: SUV Brand: Suzuki Color: Solid Fire Red Mileage: 22 Fuel Type: Petrol Fuel Capacity: 37 CC: 1197 Horsepower: 101 Transmission: Manual Seat: 5 Wheeldrive: Full Wheeldrive Distance Covered: 20000 Quantity: 1 Price: 2800000 Dimension: 151 inches (L) 68 inches (W) 60 inches (H)
car.summary: The Swift has been one of the best selling cars. The first generation of Swift which was launched back in 2005 was an instant success. The second generation of the Swift was no different. With more elements, both in the interior and exterior, and better cosmetics, the second generation of the Swift was also popular and had managed to win many prestigious awards.

car.description: Model Name: Honda City Vehicle Type: Sedan Brand: Honda Color: Dark Ruby Red Pearl Mileage: 25.6 Fuel Type: Petrol Fuel Capacity: 40 CC: 1497 Horsepower: 101 Transmission: Automatic Seat: 5 Wheeldrive: Full Wheeldrive Distance Covered: 20000 Quantity: 2 Price: 3500000 Dimension: 174 inches (L) 66 inches (W) 58 inches (H)
car.summary: Advanced mobility is in your hands with The All-New Honda City. Designed in line with a vision that is ahead of its time, utilizing cutting-edge driving innovations and delivering outstanding comfort features.

car.description: Model Name: Tata Tiago Vehicle Type: Hatchback Brand: Tata Color: Sunburst Orange Mileage: 23.84 Fuel Type: Petrol Fuel Capacity: 35 CC: 1199 Horsepower: 101 Transmission: Manual Seat: 5 Wheeldrive: Full Wheeldrive Distance Covered: 20000 Quantity: 1 Price: 2500000 Dimension: 148 inches (L) 66 inches (W) 94 inches (H)
car.summary: The Tata Tiago was born as the successor of the previous Tata Bolt, which was nothing but a heavy restyling of Tata Indica Vista. Like the Indica Vista, even the Bolt did not get the desired success and Tata began designing a completely new vehicle (Kite project) of a city car with 5-door body that could boost the sales of the brand in the territory.

car.description: Model Name: Tata Tigor Vehicle Type: Sedan Brand: Tata Color: Arizona Blue Mileage: 20.3 Fuel Type: Petrol Fuel Capacity: 35 CC: 1199 Horsepower: 101 Transmission: Automatic Seat: 5 Wheeldrive: Front Wheeldrive Distance Covered: 20000 Quantity: 1 Price: 2000000 Dimension: 154.8 inches (L) 66.02 inches (W) 60.31 inches (H)
car.summary: The Petrol engine is 1199 cc. It is available with the Manual and Automatic transmission. Depending upon the variant and fuel type the Tigor has a mileage of 20.3 kmpl. The Tigor is a 5 seater Sedan and has a length of 3993mm, width of 1677mm and a wheelbase of 2450mm.

car.description: Model Name: X-Trial Vehicle Type: SUV Brand: Nissan Color: Diamond Black Mileage: 14.42 Fuel Type: Petrol Fuel Capacity: 60 CC: 1997 Horsepower: 135 Transmission: Manual Seat: 5 Wheeldrive: Full Wheeldrive Distance Covered: 30000 Quantity: 1 Price: 10000000 Dimension: 182.6 inches (L) 71.6 inches (W) 67.32 inches (H)
car.summary: Share the joys of family life in a bigger, bolder SUV. X-Trail delivers muscular styling, solid capabilities, next-level technologies and all the comfort and flexibility you need for action-packed adventures with the kids.

car.description: Model Name: Micra Active Vehicle Type: Hatchback Brand: Nissan Color: Brick Red Mileage: 19.69 Fuel Type: Petrol Fuel Capacity: 60 CC: 1198 Horsepower: 109 Transmission: Manual Seat: 5 Wheeldrive: Front Wheeldrive Distance Covered: 15000 Quantity: 1 Price: 2000000 Dimension: 150.5 inches (L) 65.5 inches (W) 60.23 inches (H)
car.summary: The Nissan Micra Active with a new rear bumper, steering wheel mounted with audio controls, piano black facia, Bluetooth enabled audio system and driver seat height adjustment is the intelligent choice for a smart generation.

car.description: Model Name: Nissan Kicks Vehicle Type: SUV Brand: Nissan Color: Deep blue pearl Mileage: 19.69 Fuel Type: Petrol Fuel Capacity: 60 CC: 1461 Horsepower: 122 Transmission: Manual Seat: 5 Wheeldrive: Front Wheeldrive Distance Covered: 15000 Quantity: 1 Price: 5000000 Dimension: 172.59 inches (L) 71.37 inches (W) 65 inches (H)
car.summary: With Nissan Intelligent Mobility at its core, the new Nissan KICKS combines bold stance, progressive interiors and first-in-class connected car technology that makes your every drive better.
